column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A drunk woman in a car crashed at 12:50 am
column6: near the corner of Santhorok High School along Road 253.------The Toyota
column8: was badly damaged after smashing into the central divider
column13: the woman got in and it disappeared into the night
column14: leaving the smashed Prius behind. ------After the incident
column15: the local police also came to the scene and took the car  to  the traffic office of the police station of Phnom Penh
column16: waiting for the owner to come to solve the problem later.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/395530
